name: You Are An Artist
description:
You Are An Artist is the new coloring game offering the unique experience!

Forget about numbers. Forget about hours to draw one picture. Create your masterpieces in 30 seconds!

* Pick the picture and start to draw it
* Tap the screen and try not to cross borders
* Paint up your drawings
* Collect packs and unlock new colorful brushes
* Draw all 150+ painings and become a genious artist!

YAAA is the best way to become new Picasso... in few minutes!
